Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

HDRIVERSTATE

The basic type HDRIVERSTATE is a handle to an open digital audio filter.

Discussion

HDRIVERSTATE handles are returned from the AIL_open_filter function.

This handle type isn't strictly necessary, because Miles will automatically open a digital filter upon first use if you don't do it.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: AIL_close_filter, AIL_open_filter
